Control Name: 1.7.7 PaaS is used as an alternative to buying virtual machines.
Control Statement: When you use the Platform-as-a-service (PaaS) model, operational and maintenance costs are included in the pricing and in some cases can be cheaper than managing VMs on your own.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 1.7 How do you manage compute costs for this workload?
control_attributes.Control: 1.7.7 PaaS is used as an alternative to buying virtual machines.
